Herzlich Willkommen beim digitalen Rente: Welcome to the digital pension entitlement checker!
Du hast nun die Möglichkeit in 4 Schritt: You now have the opportunity to check your pension entitlements in 4 steps free of charge and without obligation. If you have any questions, we are always at your disposal. In this case, please select the Contact option.

accident.Prüfe im ersten Schritt, ob Dein Arbeits: In the first step, check whether your accident at work, your leisure-time accident or your illness meets the basic requirements for any pension entitlements from statutory and private insurance providers. In order to save you unnecessary effort, you will receive immediate feedback in the event of a negative test. Otherwise, the detailed query takes place in step two.

accident-date.Bist bzw. warst Du krankgeschrieben? *: Are or were you on sick leave? *

accident-type.Hattest Du einen Arbeitsunfall, einen Fr: Have you had an accident at work, a leisure accident or an illness?

cookie-guide-line.Achtung! Text vorerst von anderer Websit: Danger! Text from another website as a placeholder for the time being! With these cookie guidelines we would like to inform you about the use of cookies or similar storage technologies, such as pixels (hereinafter “cookies”) on our website www.protec-solutions.de. This Cookie Policy supplements our Privacy Policy.
cookie-guide-line.Cookies sind kleine Textdateien, die von: Cookies are small text files that are stored by your browser on your end device to store certain information. The next time you visit our website with the same device, the information stored in the cookies will be sent back either to our website (“First Party Cookie”) or to another website to which the cookie belongs (“Third Party Cookie”).
cookie-guide-line.Durch die gespeicherten und zurückgesand: Through the stored and returned information, the respective website recognizes that you have already accessed and visited it with the browser of your end device. We use this information to be able to optimally design and display the website according to your preferences. Only the cookie itself is identified on your end device.
cookie-guide-line.Eine Speicherung von personenbezogenen D: Personal data will only be stored with your express consent or if this is absolutely necessary in order to be able to use the service offered and accessed by you accordingly.

die-details.Nachdem die Grundvorraussetzung für Rent: After the basic requirements for pension entitlements have been met, we would like to start with the detailed check in the next step. To do this, you now enter event-specific information regarding your employer and the nature of your injury or illness.

impressum.Die Europäische Kommission stellt eine P: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (OS): https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr. Our e-mail address can be found above in the imprint. We are not willing or obliged to participate in dispute settlement procedures before a consumer arbitration board.

legal-data-policy.Wir bedanken uns für das in uns gesetzte: We would like to thank you for the trust placed in us and assure you that we will act sensitively and in the interests of our customers with the data made available to us. With the following information we inform you about the type, scope and purpose of the collection and use of personal data when using our website.
